text: to hamane sulemaan ko (isaka sahee faisala samajha diya) aur (yoon to) sabako ham hee ne phahame saleem aur ilm ata kiya aur ham hee ne pahaadon ko daood ka taabee bana diya tha ki unake saath (khuda kee) tasbeeh kiya karate the aur parindon ko (bhee taabee kar diya tha) aur ham hee (ye azaab) kiya karate the
